modules.description: Computes SHA-256 and RIPEMD-160 hashes from byte sequences using the Cstruct type. Performs HMAC-SHA512 with a provided key and message, both as Cstruct values. Initializes a cryptographic context for elliptic curve operations using the Secp256k1 library.

Handles key derivation operations for BIP32 hierarchical deterministic wallets, including private and public key generation, chain code extraction, and child key derivation. Works with elliptic curve points, private keys, and extended key structures. Used to generate deterministic cryptocurrency addresses from a master seed.

Generates and manipulates hierarchical deterministic wallet keys using elliptic curve cryptography, supporting derivation from entropy, byte sequences, and path indices. It handles both private and public key types, enabling secure key generation, transformation, and serialization. Operations include deterministic key derivation, entropy-based key creation, and conversion to and from byte buffers.
